alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 4:59AM CST until March 02 at 5:45AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blanco County in south central Texas... Central Gillespie County in south central Texas... Southeastern Llano County in south central Texas... * Until 545 AM CST. * At 459 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tivydale, or 11 miles north of Kerrville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Kingsland, Round Mountain, Horseshoe Bay, Johnson City, Stonewall, Blowout, Cain City, Tivydale, Sandy, Willow City, Rocky Hill, LBJ State Park, Rocky Creek, Hye, Blumenthal, Eckert, Crabapple, Sunrise Beach Village and LBJ National Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
